meanings.definition: A type of kayak used by Aleut and Inuit peoples.
meanings.sent1: The baidarkas glided gracefully on the water.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen paddled their baidarkas out to sea.
meanings.sent3: The baidarkas race was filled with laughter and excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her baidarkas of thoughts navigated through the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The colorful baidarkas painted a beautiful picture on the ocean.

meanings.sent1: We saw many baidarkas lined up along the shore.
meanings.sent2: The baidarkas were stored in the boathouse for winter.
meanings.sent3: The baidarkas in the museum looked like a fleet of tiny boats.
meanings.sent4: The baidarkas in the bay resembled a flock of birds on the water.
meanings.sent5: The baidarkas bobbed up and down with the rhythm of the waves.
